title: Tate
text: Tate Britain Lee Miller A major exhibition of the trailblazing surrealist photographer Lee Miller Book now Free for Members Exhibitions Left Right Exhibition Nigerian Modernism Explore the artists who revolutionised modern art in Nigeria in the mid-20th century Tate Modern Until 10 May 2026 Exhibition Turner & Constable: Rivals & Originals The definitive exhibition of two pivotal British artists in the 250th year of their births Tate Britain Until 12 Apr 2026 Exhibition Theatre Picasso Experience Picasso’s works in a new way with an exhibition staged by contemporary artists Tate Modern Until 12 Apr 2026 Exhibition Emilija Škarnulytė Take a journey across space and time in the immersive films of Emilija Škarnulytė Tate St Ives Until 12 Apr 2026 See more exhibitions Galleries Tate Britain Free admission Tate Modern Free admission Tate Liverpool + RIBA North Free admission Tate St Ives Ticket or membership card required Support us Buy books, prints and more Shopping with Tate helps supports our galleries Donate to Tate Your donation could provide art materials for young people or help an artwork in need of conservation TATE MEMBERS From £7.50 a month, Members enjoy free exhibition entry at all our galleries with no need to book Join today Read, watch, listen Left Right Stories Watch videos, listen to audio and read articles about art and artists Tate Etc. Tate Etc. is Tate's art magazine, published three times a year Play games, make art and explore artists Go to Tate Kids Delve into Centuries of art 78,000 Artworks 4,000 Artists 22,000 Archive Items Shop Books Discover our titles on art history, artists, and our award-winning children's books Gifts Shop art-inspired gifts for all ages and tastes Prints Browse from over 1,000 artworks from Tate's collection, to enjoy your favourite art from our galleries in your home
